description:
Robbed of his freedom, Akira’s mind stops functioning, similar to his time working at the corporation. Seeing this, Shizuka is reminded of her own past. On the final day, with Kosugi in complete control of his mind, Akira makes an astonishing decision.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’aire de repos de la mort
SA オブ ザ デッド
